column4: I just installed Ndiswrapper and tried modprobe ndiswrapper and it threw this at me "FATAL: Could not open '/lib/modules/2.6.20-15-generic/kernel/ubuntu/misc/ndiswrapper/ndiswrapper.ko': No such file or directory"
Sounds like you updated you kernel after installing, Id just try removing then reinstalling it?
You can download the deb for it from somewhere, USB it into that laptop then sudo dpkg -i it?
